alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Harrison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 14 at 9:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Harrison and central Hancock Counties through 945 PM CST... At 900 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shoreline Park, or near Waveland, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gulfport, Biloxi, Ocean Springs, Long Beach, Bay St. Louis, Waveland, Diamondhead, St. Martin, D`iberville, Kiln, Lyman, Shoreline Park, Saucier, Latimer, Gulf Hills and Gulfport Airport. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Mississippi between mile markers 5 and 47. Interstate 110 in Mississippi between mile markers 1 and 4. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
